title: 87/147/EEC: Commission Decision of 18 February 1987 amending Council Decision 78/476/EEC on the equivalence of checks for the maintenance of varieties carried out in third countries
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 18 February 1987
amending Council Decision 78/476/EEC on the equivalence of checks for the maintenance of varieties carried out in third countries
(87/147/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
In column 4 of item 6b of the Annex to Decision 78/476/EEC the existing entry is replaced by:
'Agricultural plant species referred to in Directives 66/401/EEC, 66/402/EEC and 69/208/EEC'.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 18 February 1987.
For the Commission
Frans ANDRIESSEN
Vice-President
